description:
The Duel between Kurosaki and Crow grows ever more intense! Crow rides the momentum caused by his revival of his ace card using Phantom Synchro. Kurosaki suddenly calls for the Duel to be suspended! Crow ignores his cries and continues the Duel, but Kurosaki has seen something unthinkable, and...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuukyoku no Hayabusa vs Kurohane no Ikazuchi
The Ultimate Falcon vs the Black-Feathered Thunder
究極の隼vs黒羽の雷[くろはねのいかずち]
